sentences.english: Conclusion Arthrolysis can improve the effect on scapulohumeral periarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論關節鬆動術可以提高肩周炎患者的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: It indicates that wrist-ankle acupuncture combinated massage ha…
sentences.chinese: 說明腕踝針配合推拿治療肩周炎療效好。

sentences.english: Objective To further investigate the clinical efficacy of balance acupuncture for the treatment of shoulder periarthritis due to cervical spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察平衡鍼灸治療頸源性肩周炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Conclusions Massage is an effective therapy for omarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論手法按摩是肩周炎有效的治療方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of massage on patients with omarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察手法按摩對肩周炎患者的治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect of periarthritis of shoulder with the massage and cupping.
sentences.chinese: 目的推拿配合火罐對治療肩周炎的療效。

sentences.english: Of senile knee joints, frozen shoulder can be cured.
sentences.chinese: 對老年性膝骨關節，肩周炎均可治癒。

sentences.english: It indicates that wrist-ankle acupuncture combinated massage has better curative effects for scapulohumeral periarthritis .
sentences.chinese: 說明腕踝針配合推拿治療肩周炎療效好。
